text: The system shall allow event-delay capability for pre-admission, discharge, and transfer orders.

definitions.system: A system is a computer software being designed.

definitions.event-delay: This occurs when there is an implementation delay.

definitions.discharge: This is a system discharge update.

definitions.capability: The system is has some capability update issues.

text: The system shall allow complete order sets to be predefined and personalized.

definitions.system: A system is a computer software being designed.

definitions.personalized: Software designed for a specific task.
